# New data viz for spatial data  

```{r}
require(leaflet)
require(dplyr)
latlon <- c(32.79667, 70.32346) # emory
ecc_label <- "Somewhere in the world"
ecc_popup <- "Fly here one day"
map <- leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  setView(latlon[2],latlon[1],zoom = 10) %>% 
  addMarkers(latlon[2],latlon[1],label=ecc_label,popup=ecc_popup) 
map 
```
